CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows :

CARDINAL . On TIME DATE broke out in a bar in the centre of the village of GPE ( NORP district ) . CARDINAL . Soon afterwards , news of the incident spread and a large number of villagers learned of PERSON death . Enraged , they gathered together to find the GPE .
